text: "All About Soul" is a 1993 song by Billy Joel and is the third single from his 12th studio album River of Dreams. It went to number 9 in Canada, number 22 in New Zealand, number 29 in the United States, number 30 in Iceland, number 32 in the United Kingdom, number 34 in Australia, number 42 in the Netherlands and number 51 in Germany. ==Track listing== UK CD single # "All About Soul" (radio edit) – 4:15 # "All About Soul" (remix) – 6:05 # "All About Soul" (LP version) – 6:01 # "You Picked a Real Bad Time" – 4:54 ==References== Category:1993 songs Category:Billy Joel songs
title: All About Soul
